TextView.android:text: Note : Pictures from outside, manufactuing site, store house, inventory
What is the name of the official taking part in the assessment?
Designation of the concerned official in the firm?
NOTE : Photo of office ID proof
Show the process of production of the product as per the process flow diagram
Show the machines critical for production for the product
Explain the process for quality assurance? ( Discussion with Quality Manager)
What key aspects are focussed while selecting suppliers?
Note : Picture of the facility, any ready shipment (3-4 photos)
Are there any effective signs and labels for safety?
Are there any fire extinguisher and other safety equipment in sight?
Show the R and D facility.
Show the products/processes for which patents have been obtained.
NOTE : Picture of the product for which patent has been obtained
NOTE : Picture of any ready prototype
